Class R2ProjectionOrthographic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.core.R2ProjectionOrthographic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    R2ProjectionReadableType, R2ProjectionType, R2ProjectionWritableType

    public final class R2ProjectionOrthographic
extends Object
implements R2ProjectionType
    An orthographic projection.
